basic_info.description: ðŸ”Ž Looking for an end-of-master's internship (M2) from February 2024 to July 2024 (6 months). Below you can find all my academic projects with demo in the browser (for 11 of them). If you're only interesting by demos please refer to my github-profile page (link above, in the left corner) to get a list of them and their urls. Otherwise, enjoy illustrations and a short description with used CS skills for each project by clicking on their tile.

projects.title: Bomberman
projects.description: First project of my bachelor program, the goal was to build a game using a graphic library called MLV. Live demo at: https://william-maillard.github.io/bomberman/. Source code at: https://gitlab.com/William-maillard/bomberman

projects.title: formal languages
projects.description: creation of a deterministic finite automaton.

projects.title: Correctly Parenthesised
projects.description:
Creation of a program that checks that a string of parentheses is correctly parenthesised in x86 assembler.
 The user can define the parenthesis pairs with any character at the start of the program.

projects.title: k nearest neighbours
projects.description: Graphical representation of the k-ppv search using a tree.

projects.title: Des restes Une recette
projects.description: 'Des restes Une recette' means 'Leftovers a recipe' and it's a Website that lets you search for a recipe based on the leftovers in your fridge. Logged-in members can vote for their favourite recipes. Website availible at https://desrestesunerecette.000webhostapp.com/. Source code : https://gitlab.com/William-maillard/ujm_l2_s4_dw1

projects.title: Graph theory
projects.description: Implementation of algorithm seen during the course graph theory like : topological sorting, width/depth graph visit, find minimum path length, minimum spanning tree (Prim and Kruskal), minimum weight path (Dijkstra).

projects.title: Java Drawing app
projects.description:
Create a drawing app in java, made during practical session of OOP course.
Live demo at : https://william-maillard.github.io/drawing_app/. Source code at: https://gitlab.com/William-maillard/poo_wargame_and_drawing_app

projects.title: Wargame
projects.description: Create a wargame in JAVA and Swing. First Object Oriented project. Live demo at https://william-maillard.github.io/wargame/. Source code at: https://gitlab.com/William-maillard/poo_wargame_and_drawing_app

projects.title: Compilation
projects.description: Create a compiler to transcribe a program (whose syntax is chosen arbitrarily) into a tree that will then be executed by a virtual machine.

projects.title: System Programming
projects.description: Project carried out in 24 hours to simulate the management of a garage using the tools seen in this UE such as: inter-process communication with signals message queues semaphores shared memory segments

projects.title: Free-Steal
projects.description: Subject: Create a multiplayer game to be played in a cinema before a film is shown (~a hundred people) Achieved: Multiplayer game where you move a character with your phone (controller on a website), you have to collect as many keys as possible in the time allowed to win. Watch out for enemies and other players who may fire missiles. Deployment: May 2022 screening at the MÃ©liez cinema in Saint-Etienne.

projects.title: Graphic Computing
projects.description: Management of a large number of elements (variable) in a 3D environment using an octree.

projects.title: Webapp Text Editor
projects.description: Creation of a shared java document with 1 server ,1 heavy client (swing) and 1 light client (java-script).

projects.title: OpenAirbnb
projects.description: The project aims to provide an open source webapp to rent (from both side, owner and tenant) an individual's home.The application will allow the search of rant by location and many other filter like experiences (tree house, farm, ...), functionnalities (bed sheets provide, washing machine, allowing pet, ...), ... And if we have time, we will try to expand search on a map, in addition of the form. Deploy at https://william-openairbnb.onrender.com/ , source code at https://gitlab.com/William-maillard/2022-pwa-d

projects.title: Study : Knapsack Problem algorithms
projects.description: The project aims to program many algorithms to solve the 0/1 knapsack problem and make a study about their running time and the quality of their solution.

projects.title: Documents and structured data
projects.description: The aim of the project is to extract data from a company's timesheets. These documents are received by the application in .ods (Open Document Spreadsheet) format. The extracted data will be stored in a database, whose entity-association schema is provided in appendix 1, so that it can be used to respond to queries from a business application. The application will be able to request information about employees and current projects. These requests will be configurable. Each parameter will have a default value, making them all optional.

projects.title: AlpesTransport
projects.description: Wikibase is an open-source platform developed by the Wikimedia Foundation for storing, managing and publishing structured and linked data using Semantic Web technologies such as RDF (Resource Description Framework) and SPARQL (SPARQL Protocol and RDF Query Language).

projects.title: E-commerce revisite
projects.description: creation and saving of 3D shop models loading and visiting a shop with a meta-human creation of a neo4j DB to store products (generated with Java Faker)

projects.title: Handwritten digit recognition
projects.description: The aim of this project was to train and fine-tune a deep learning model to recognise numbers from images of handwritten numbers.Attached is a link to a runtime environment for jupyter-notebook (binder) linked to the gitlab repository.

projects.title: HMM sentiment analysis
projects.description: Practical work on machine learning with sikit-learn based on the practical sessions of the course, followed by a project on sentiment analysis using a hidden Markov model. Attached is a link to a runtime environment for jupyter-notebook (binder) linked to the gitlab repository.

experience.title: Intern IT
technologies: containerisation technologie such as docker and kubernetes

implement an innovative architecture 
from an R&D industrial project
